Title: The Man in the Basement
Writer: Gideon Raff (based on the original Israeli series "Prisoners of War" by), Howard Gordon (developed for American television by), Alex Gansa (developed for American television by), Chip Johannessen
Actors: Claire Danes, Rupert Friend, Elizabeth Marvel, F. Murray Abraham
Plot: Carrie and Reda fight for their client while Quinn fights against his new life. Saul and Dar suspect Keane has a secret.
